import React, { Component } from 'react'; import sectiondata from '../../data/sections.json'; import parse from 'html-react-parser'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; class AolGold extends Component { render() { let publicUrl = process.env.PUBLIC_URL+'/' let imagealt = 'image' let data = sectiondata.banner return
Phone no.: +1-844-325-9082 AOL Desktop Gold Support

AOL Desktop Gold Support

AOL Mail, with its unique software structure, offers the best email services and primary internet browser capabilities like streaming, surfing, reading etc., to its users. The software has different versions customised according to the user's needs. Among them is the AOL Desktop Gold. It is the premium version of the AOL desktop and includes premium features. We here have provided AOL Desktop Gold support services to help you set up your AOL Desktop Gold software and resolve all your problems. By using our support services, we guarantee you a satisfactory problem-resolving experience. Keep scrolling to explore our top AOL Desktop Support services.

The software also displays trouble â€“ free updates and improved security. Users also benefit from the premium software version, which allows you to access it from wherever you want.

The AOL software has some versions from which the AOL desktop gold is the best, as this softwareâ€™s premium version. It comes with some very brilliant features that you only need to buy and AOL Desktop Gold Download package to get them on your desktop. To use AOL Desktop Gold, you should be a PRO member. Otherwise, itâ€™s not possible for you to get most out of this software.

Download AOL Desktop GOLD

How to Download AOL Desktop Gold or Install AOL Gold?

As the population increases, the demand for technology has also increased and several companies have launched their innovative ideas on the market. Some are good, some are average, but AOL desktop gold is at the top of the list when it comes to exceptional all â€“ round service. AOL gold has now powered many desktops and has also given them some unparalleled effective features and benefits. Many people throughout the world have used it.

It has been named one of the best software on the globe with so many features. The AOL Desktop Gold allows users to access emails, stream videos and music online, news, entertainment, browse various websites and much more in one place.

How to Download AOL Desktop Gold or Install AOL Gold

Once you can still talk about downloading AOL Desktop Gold you need to learn the softwareâ€™s basic specifications. The device requirements which you must confirm before downloading AOL Desktop Gold are mentioned below:

  • You must have at least 512 MB of space on your hard drive and a 7- and higher Windows Operating System.
  • Your RAM should be at least 1 GB, and your internet explorer should be greater than 7 +.
  • A computer with or faster 266 MHz processor and a screen resolution of 1024*768. Strong internet connectivity is also important.

By now everyone must be aware that you can download AOL Desktop Gold in three ways.

  • Membership by AOL Advantage Program.
  • With a trial or subscription to AOL Desktop Gold and
  • Confirmation link via the official AOL email.

Below are some of the highlighted features that AOL Gold is offering:

AOL Desktop GOLD Download and Install

AOL Desktop Gold is a fantastic way to access all your E-Mails using Windows or MAC PC. Thereâ€™s no doubt that AOL Desktop Gold offers a wide range of tools and add-ons which are free and easy to use. It provides full privacy and functionality to the users which is an excellent thing about AOL Desktop Gold. But, in many cases, people are having a problem with this software such as application not responding, crashing, etc.

Features of AOL Desktop Gold:
With so many characteristics, the best are:
  • It is known to be an all in one software because it provides users with many benefits.
  • This software also enhances the security features. Once you have this, what you download and browse online is always monitored.And the software also includes an additional 2-step checking feature that helps you keep your items safe and secure.
  • The software also introduced an augmented capture function for the screenshot.
  • Data on AOL gold can be easily imported and exported.
  • This Application is Effortless to use.
  • 2-Step Authentication.
  • Full Customization features.
  • Useful Tools Available.
  • Available at $4.99 only. (Free For Premium Members)
  • Automatic Updates.
  • Full Privacy and Security features available.

Download AOL Desktop Gold â€“ What are you waiting for in your plan to download desktop gold and start the fascinating journey of finding this softwareâ€™s unique features? You can always turn to AOL Desktop Gold for support with something, and your query will also be responded. This is popular because of the new user interface properties and capabilities which are now available, as well as advanced security features. AOL Gold will help you access your messages, perform content queries, and even browse the web. AOL Gold is the best of all internet browsers.

What is the Procedure for Change AOL Desktop Gold Download Password?

Do you want to know how to change your AOL email password?

Our experts will explain you step by step the process of recovery your AOL Email Password. AOL, or America Online, is an American multinational media corporation that owns a small a number of websites and manages the digital distribution of content, products, and services for customers, publishers, and advertisers. Get access to internet portal, email, text messaging, and a web browser. Todayâ€™s headlines, fast news updates, instant mail, videos, links to all AOL Customer Support Number, and urgent AOL Support Service notifications are all available on your phone.

Minimum System Requirements to Download AOL Gold
  • Operating System â€“ Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 8.1, Windows 10.
  • Processor- Minimum 266 MHz or faster Computer Processor
  • Screen Resolution- 1024 * 768 or higher screen resolution recommended.
  • Memory â€“ Minimum of 1 GB RAM, 512 MB free hard disk space.
  • Internet â€“ You must have active Internet connection.

What are the System Requirements to Install AOL Desktop Gold?

Before you download and install it on your system, you should understand the basic system requirements so that the latest AOL Gold software can be easily downloaded and installed.

Windows 7, 8 or 10, 266 MHz or faster processor of your PC; recommended screen resolution of 1024 x 768 or higher 1 GB of RAM, of free hard disk space of 512 MB * Internet connection.

Steps To Install AOL Gold:

AOL Desktop Gold is available for PRO members only. Thereâ€™s no doubt that every penny you spend will result in many advantages. You should have a license for this software, but if youâ€™re already their PRO member, thereâ€™s no need to pay for it.

The installation process is straightforward. Itâ€™s just like we install any other software. Keep in mind that you should download this software from the official AOL mail website. Download AOL Gold from 3rd party sites isnâ€™t recommended.

  • Visit AOL mail account.
  • Sign in to your account.
  • Click on All Products option.
  • Select AOL Gold option.
  • Download the installer.
  • Open Downloads folder and look for the Installer.
  • Double click to open it.
  • Follow on-screen options to install the software.
  • Sign In to your account.
  • Enjoy!

AOL Desktop Gold Problems: Contact AOL Customer Support Number - (888) 503-7543

Sometimes, itâ€™s just awkward that weâ€™re facing problems with our AOL gold software. The software is fully furnished on its own, but there are some glitches which result in a lot of errors and problem. Our technicians have following a quick solution which will solve most userâ€™s issues. Otherwise, call or chat with us to get all your issues resolved.

Quick Fix 1:
  • Close the AOL gold software.
  • Navigate to Power > Restart.
  • Wait till system is rebooted.
  • Now, check if the problem is fixed or not.
Quick Fix 2:
  • Visit Program and Features using control panel.
  • Uninstall AOL Desktop Gold software.
  • Now, re-install the software.
  • Sign In again.
  • It should work fine.

If you are facing issues Download Install Error issues, AOL Mail Support Get help with your product by phone, email, or chat. AOL Mail Community Get instant help then you can call us atðŸ“² (888) 503-7543. AOL Mail Support. We are available 24/7.
